lead_paragraph: EXSTEIN--Louis "Buddy" H.,born December 14, 1924, died May 12, 2016. Beloved husband of Barbara Marks, and predeceased by his first wife Babs, passed away peacefully at Sharon Hospital in Connecticut, on May 12. He was the fond father of Michael and Ted and their respective spouses Lida and Patti. He doted on his five grandchildren: Jeremy, Adam, Isabel, Max, and Benjamin in addition to his second wife Barbara's daughters Shelia (Roy), Nancy (Jimmy), and nephew Gerry (Patti). He is survived by his sister Theza and many loving nieces and nephews. He was dearly loved and will be sorely missed by all who knew him. Buddy proudly served in the United States Army Air Corps during World War II and in the Air Force during the Korean War. He was an accomplished Certified Public Accountant, beginning his career at Touche, Ross and served as the Vice President at Schober Organ, and CEO of Youth and Men's Fashion Guild in New York City. Buddy was also a long time member of the International Chinese Snuff Bottle Society, serving on its board. A memorial service will be held at Schwartz Brothers Jeff Memorial Chapel, Forest Hills, on May 15 at 2pm. Buddy's remains will be interred at Arlington National Cemetery. 1/3
